pkgmetadata.longdescription: Modelling Continuous Report Visual Short-Term Memory Studies // A set of utility functions for analysing and modelling data from continuous report short-term memory experiments using either the 2-component mixture model of Zhang and Luck (2008) doi:10.1038/nature06860 or the 3-component mixture model of Bays et al. (2009) doi:10.1167/9.10.7. Users are also able to simulate from these models.
